column5: Just heard on the news Pat Burn's widow's car was broken into and number of Pat's items were stolen. What a bunch of idiots, to say the least.
No way !!!!! Never ceases to amaze me how low some members of the human species will go.What a tragic story.
Here is the report form 680News. Some sad cases out there.  http://www.680news.com/sports/article/150864--hockey-items-stolen-during-pat-burns-funeral
That is why it is always recommended to have a neighbor or someone you can trust watch the house during the funeral.....thieves watch the obituary notices in the local papers.
Thieves have NO CLASS, NO HONOR, and should be shot.
Worst part is they think it's an inside job, someone knew what was in the car. There aren't words strong enough to express how disgusting this is.
I belive the stuff was stolen from his widow's car at the funeral..sickening
correct and correct.  Shot P on and shot some more.
why is it that I'm not even surprised? What a world
sentence the dirtbag to a year of service with Don Cherry
